Comment: Bezos folds in a suck-up call to Trump. He's rich but he doesn't want to let a cent go, pay decent wages to workers, or, per reports, stop treating them like indentured serfs without even time to take a piss. His rockets are the ultimate burn up of cash he could use to help others but instead they are a giant ''fuck you' to civilization. His legacy is cemented as a weakling avaricious dumpster fire.      Trump called Bezos on Tuesday morning to complain about the reports, two senior officials in the White House [told CNN](https://www.cnn.com/2025/04/29/business/white-house-calls-report-that-amazon-is-adding-a-tariff-charge-a-hostile-action/index.html), adding the president was “pissed.”  Trump [confirmed](https://x.com/cspan/status/1917288794153160864?s=46) Tuesday afternoon he talked to “good guy” Bezos, who “did the right thing” and “solved the problem very quickly,” according to the president.
